name: RIDERS BOX
description: Horses have a strong standing in Norse mythology where 18 horses are named. Most famous is perhaps the eight-legged Sleipnir, offspring of Loki and Svaðilfari. Sleipnir was the world’s fastest horse and Odin’s mount. Arvak and Alsvinn are the horses, who draw the chariot of the sun. Equipped with cooling iron, to prevent them for burning.
